entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [9.0.100-alpha.1.24070.3] dotnet tool install command get access deny message #38183
    9.0.1xx

Updated

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • zsh: command not found: dotnet on Mac m1 #22910
  • .NET6 - MSB4236: The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found #23311
    Discussion
  • Permission Denied or Access Denied when running a global dotnet tool #41947

PullRequests

Created

  • ref: remove unused file #41987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Pass along top-level UseSystemLibs option to runtime #41984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix workload install or update with workload set specified in global.json #41983
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add feature switch for StackTraceSupport #41873
  • [main] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #41968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41942
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] [IGNORE] #41948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2488592 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
